content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":251872,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、あそこだ。魔物将軍の奴、俺達が攻めてきたのを見て","translatedEnglishLine":"No, over there. That demon general, seeing us attack,"},{"lineNumber":251873,"originalJapaneseLine":"あわてて周囲の部隊に集結を命じているのだろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"must be hastily ordering the surrounding troops to gather."},{"lineNumber":251874,"originalJapaneseLine":"だから、奴はあの中心に居る、いくぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"So he's at the center there, let's go."},{"lineNumber":251875,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスアタックで魔物を蹴散らす。","translatedEnglishLine":"We'll scatter the demons with Lance Attack."},{"lineNumber":251876,"originalJapaneseLine":"どけーじゃまだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Move aside, you're in the way."},{"lineNumber":251877,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして魔物の壁を突破した先に、のそのそと歩いている丸くてでかい奴がいた","translatedEnglishLine":"And beyond breaking through the wall of demons, there was a big, round guy lumbering along."},{"lineNumber":251878,"originalJapaneseLine":"いたぞ、魔物将軍だ。ぶっ殺す","translatedEnglishLine":"There he is, the demon general. I'll kill him."},{"lineNumber":251879,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍「なんじゃ・・・どうして、こんな小数の連中に・・」","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon General: \"What... why by such a small number of guys...?\""},{"lineNumber":251880,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍は倒した、腹の中の女の子をひっぱりだしたいが","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon general was defeated, I want to pull out the girl inside his stomach,"},{"lineNumber":251881,"originalJapaneseLine":"周囲の魔物兵が向かってきている、くそっとランスは諦めて逃げる。","translatedEnglishLine":"but demon soldiers around are advancing. Damn, Lance gives up and flees."},{"lineNumber":251882,"originalJapaneseLine":"１体は倒した、もう一体どこかにいるはずだが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"One was defeated, but another must be somewhere..."},{"lineNumber":251883,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここはいったん退くぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's withdraw for now."},{"lineNumber":251884,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍と何度か戦闘しながら、ランス達はなんとか少し離れた場所の砦まで戻った。","translatedEnglishLine":"After fighting the demon army several times, Lance and the others somehow returned to a fortress a little distance away."},{"lineNumber":251885,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス軍が使用していた砦だ。数名のゼス兵士が居て扉を開けてくれた。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a fortress used by the Zeth army. A few Zeth soldiers were there and opened the door for us."},{"lineNumber":251886,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだいるのか、なら戦えよとランスは言うが","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance said, \"Oh, you're here, then fight,\" but"},{"lineNumber":251887,"originalJapaneseLine":"兵士達はびびっている、すみません・・ここには８人しかいないのです","translatedEnglishLine":"The soldiers were scared and said, \"Sorry... there are only eight of us here.\""},{"lineNumber":251888,"originalJapaneseLine":"あんな魔軍の大軍に向かうなんて犬死でしか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Facing such a large demon army would only be a meaningless death..."},{"lineNumber":251889,"originalJapaneseLine":"８人だと・・砦の中をみわたすとけっこういた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Only eight... but looking around inside the fortress, there were quite a few."},{"lineNumber":251890,"originalJapaneseLine":"嘘つけ、いっぱいいるじゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Lies, there's a lot here."},{"lineNumber":251891,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが見て言う、いえ違います・・これは・・石化されています。","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone looked and said, \"No, that's not right... they are petrified.\""},{"lineNumber":251892,"originalJapaneseLine":"石化されているゼス兵士が３０名ほど砦の中にいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"About 30 Zeth soldiers were petrified inside the fortress."},{"lineNumber":251893,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　その頃、メディウサとアレフガルド","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, Medusa and Alefgard."},{"lineNumber":251894,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　石化能力の事","translatedEnglishLine":"About the petrification ability."},{"lineNumber":251895,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　カオスを警戒してメディウサに外出しないでとお願いしている","translatedEnglishLine":"They are asking Medusa not to go outside, wary of Chaos."},{"lineNumber":251896,"originalJapaneseLine":"砦、ランス達・・","translatedEnglishLine":"The fortress, Lance and the others..."},{"lineNumber":251897,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサが襲ってきたのか・・ふむふむ","translatedEnglishLine":"Did Medusa attack? Hmm, hmm."},{"lineNumber":251898,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス兵が、仲間がこんな状態だから我々は戦えない","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth soldiers say they can't fight because their comrades are in such a state."},{"lineNumber":251899,"originalJapaneseLine":"この石化、私直せますよとクルックーが解除していく","translatedEnglishLine":"Klukku says, \"I can cure this petrification,\" and starts to reverse it."},{"lineNumber":251900,"originalJapaneseLine":"私も出来ますとシィルも","translatedEnglishLine":"Shiel also says, \"I can do it too.\""},{"lineNumber":251901,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人して、石化を解除した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Together, the two removed the petrification."},{"lineNumber":251902,"originalJapaneseLine":"さて、おまえら、これで戦えるな、いけー","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, you guys can fight with this, go!"},{"lineNumber":251903,"originalJapaneseLine":"うわっ、すみません・・無理です、４０人弱では一緒です","translatedEnglishLine":"Whoa, sorry... it's impossible. With fewer than 40, it's the same."},{"lineNumber":251904,"originalJapaneseLine":"ま、雑魚兵どもだからしかないな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, since they're low-level soldiers, it can't be helped."},{"lineNumber":251905,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は砦の屋上にいった","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others went to the fortress rooftop."},{"lineNumber":251906,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し離れた所に魔軍が進撃している。","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army is advancing a little distance away."},{"lineNumber":251907,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍を一体倒したので数は減っている、２万弱という所か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"They defeated one demon general, so their number has decreased, around just under 20,000..."},{"lineNumber":251908,"originalJapaneseLine":"今、それを防ぐ部隊もいない。ゼス首都がピンチ","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, there is no unit defending against this. Zeth's capital is in danger."},{"lineNumber":251909,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちっ、だいぶまとまった集団になっているな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Tch, they've become quite an organized group."},{"lineNumber":251910,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様の強襲で魔物将軍が一人やられたので用心しているようですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Because Lord Lance's raid took out one demon general, they seem to be cautious."},{"lineNumber":251911,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達が戦わないと防げない状況だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a situation where only Lance and the others could stop it by fighting."},{"lineNumber":251912,"originalJapaneseLine":"その時","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment,"},{"lineNumber":251913,"originalJapaneseLine":"キランと天が光る","translatedEnglishLine":"The sky flashed brightly."},{"lineNumber":251914,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして何かが・・魔軍陣地の中に落ちていった","translatedEnglishLine":"And something... fell into the demon army's camp."},{"lineNumber":251915,"originalJapaneseLine":"しばらくして魔軍が動揺しはじめ・・そして逃げ出していった","translatedEnglishLine":"After a while, the demon army started to panic... then began fleeing."},{"lineNumber":251916,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだ、何が起こった。","translatedEnglishLine":"What is this, what happened?"},{"lineNumber":251917,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、いってみよう","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, let's go see."},{"lineNumber":251918,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスは逃げる魔物兵を追った","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance chased the fleeing demon soldiers."},{"lineNumber":251919,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこには魔物将軍の死体が転がっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"There lay the dead body of the demon general."},{"lineNumber":251920,"originalJapaneseLine":"何十にも魔物兵に守られランスが近寄る事が出来なかった奴だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"He was guarded by dozens of demon soldiers and Lance couldn't get close."},{"lineNumber":251921,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰がどうやって殺したんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Who and how was he killed?"},{"lineNumber":251922,"originalJapaneseLine":"側で腰を抜かしていた魔物兵がいたのでそいつから聞き出す","translatedEnglishLine":"There was a demon soldier who had collapsed nearby, so Lance questioned him."},{"lineNumber":251923,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺は見たんだ、天がきらっと光ったら、頭くらいの石が落ちてきて、","translatedEnglishLine":"I saw it, the sky flashed brightly, then a stone about the size of a head fell,"},{"lineNumber":251924,"originalJapaneseLine":"まっすぐに魔物将軍様に直撃したんだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"and it hit the demon general directly."},{"lineNumber":251925,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんな奇跡あっていいのか、なんて事だ。俺達はもう少しで一番乗りで","translatedEnglishLine":"Is such a miracle allowed? What the hell. We were about to be the first to"},{"lineNumber":251926,"originalJapaneseLine":"人間どもの首都に攻め込んで傍若無人出来たのにー","translatedEnglishLine":"invade the humans' capital and act without restraint—"},{"lineNumber":251927,"originalJapaneseLine":"隕石か・・確かに、たまに空から落ちてくるというが、それがこのタイミングで","translatedEnglishLine":"A meteorite, huh... It's true they sometimes fall from the sky, but at this timing..."},{"lineNumber":251928,"originalJapaneseLine":"それも直撃するとは・・まさに奇跡だな。","translatedEnglishLine":"And it hit directly... truly a miracle."},{"lineNumber":251929,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ・・この石がそうですよ。魔物将軍のそばに落ちていました。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah... this stone is it. It fell near the demon general."},{"lineNumber":251930,"originalJapaneseLine":"さわってみたら・・あちっ（隕石ほしいなぁ・・とマリアが手を出す）","translatedEnglishLine":"I touched it... ouch! (Maria reaches out saying, 'I want that meteorite...')"},{"lineNumber":251931,"originalJapaneseLine":"すると隕石がパカっと割れた。中から煙と共に羊皮紙が出てきた","translatedEnglishLine":"Then the meteorite cracked open. A scroll appeared from inside along with smoke."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、あそこだ。魔物将軍の奴、俺達が攻めてきたのを見て
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, over there. That demon general, seeing us attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あわてて周囲の部隊に集結を命じているのだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: must be hastily ordering the surrounding troops to gather.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、奴はあの中心に居る、いくぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So he's at the center there, let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスアタックで魔物を蹴散らす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll scatter the demons with Lance Attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どけーじゃまだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Move aside, you're in the way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして魔物の壁を突破した先に、のそのそと歩いている丸くてでかい奴がいた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And beyond breaking through the wall of demons, there was a big, round guy lumbering along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いたぞ、魔物将軍だ。ぶっ殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There he is, the demon general. I'll kill him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍「なんじゃ・・・どうして、こんな小数の連中に・・」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon General: "What... why by such a small number of guys...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍は倒した、腹の中の女の子をひっぱりだしたいが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general was defeated, I want to pull out the girl inside his stomach,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲の魔物兵が向かってきている、くそっとランスは諦めて逃げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but demon soldiers around are advancing. Damn, Lance gives up and flees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １体は倒した、もう一体どこかにいるはずだが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One was defeated, but another must be somewhere...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここはいったん退くぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's withdraw for now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍と何度か戦闘しながら、ランス達はなんとか少し離れた場所の砦まで戻った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After fighting the demon army several times, Lance and the others somehow returned to a fortress a little distance away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス軍が使用していた砦だ。数名のゼス兵士が居て扉を開けてくれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a fortress used by the Zeth army. A few Zeth soldiers were there and opened the door for us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだいるのか、なら戦えよとランスは言うが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance said, "Oh, you're here, then fight," but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士達はびびっている、すみません・・ここには８人しかいないのです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldiers were scared and said, "Sorry... there are only eight of us here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんな魔軍の大軍に向かうなんて犬死でしか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Facing such a large demon army would only be a meaningless death...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ８人だと・・砦の中をみわたすとけっこういた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only eight... but looking around inside the fortress, there were quite a few.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嘘つけ、いっぱいいるじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lies, there's a lot here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが見て言う、いえ違います・・これは・・石化されています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone looked and said, "No, that's not right... they are petrified."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 石化されているゼス兵士が３０名ほど砦の中にいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 30 Zeth soldiers were petrified inside the fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、メディウサとアレフガルド
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Medusa and Alefgard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 石化能力の事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About the petrification ability.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスを警戒してメディウサに外出しないでとお願いしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are asking Medusa not to go outside, wary of Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砦、ランス達・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fortress, Lance and the others...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサが襲ってきたのか・・ふむふむ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did Medusa attack? Hmm, hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス兵が、仲間がこんな状態だから我々は戦えない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth soldiers say they can't fight because their comrades are in such a state.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この石化、私直せますよとクルックーが解除していく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Klukku says, "I can cure this petrification," and starts to reverse it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も出来ますとシィルも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shiel also says, "I can do it too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人して、石化を解除した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Together, the two removed the petrification.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さて、おまえら、これで戦えるな、いけー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, you guys can fight with this, go!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うわっ、すみません・・無理です、４０人弱では一緒です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa, sorry... it's impossible. With fewer than 40, it's the same.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、雑魚兵どもだからしかないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, since they're low-level soldiers, it can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は砦の屋上にいった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others went to the fortress rooftop.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し離れた所に魔軍が進撃している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army is advancing a little distance away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍を一体倒したので数は減っている、２万弱という所か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They defeated one demon general, so their number has decreased, around just under 20,000...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、それを防ぐ部隊もいない。ゼス首都がピンチ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, there is no unit defending against this. Zeth's capital is in danger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、だいぶまとまった集団になっているな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, they've become quite an organized group.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様の強襲で魔物将軍が一人やられたので用心しているようですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because Lord Lance's raid took out one demon general, they seem to be cautious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が戦わないと防げない状況だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a situation where only Lance and the others could stop it by fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キランと天が光る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sky flashed brightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして何かが・・魔軍陣地の中に落ちていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And something... fell into the demon army's camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくして魔軍が動揺しはじめ・・そして逃げ出していった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a while, the demon army started to panic... then began fleeing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、何が起こった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is this, what happened?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、いってみよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's go see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは逃げる魔物兵を追った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance chased the fleeing demon soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこには魔物将軍の死体が転がっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There lay the dead body of the demon general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何十にも魔物兵に守られランスが近寄る事が出来なかった奴だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was guarded by dozens of demon soldiers and Lance couldn't get close.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰がどうやって殺したんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who and how was he killed?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 側で腰を抜かしていた魔物兵がいたのでそいつから聞き出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was a demon soldier who had collapsed nearby, so Lance questioned him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は見たんだ、天がきらっと光ったら、頭くらいの石が落ちてきて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I saw it, the sky flashed brightly, then a stone about the size of a head fell,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まっすぐに魔物将軍様に直撃したんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it hit the demon general directly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな奇跡あっていいのか、なんて事だ。俺達はもう少しで一番乗りで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is such a miracle allowed? What the hell. We were about to be the first to

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間どもの首都に攻め込んで傍若無人出来たのにー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: invade the humans' capital and act without restraint—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隕石か・・確かに、たまに空から落ちてくるというが、それがこのタイミングで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A meteorite, huh... It's true they sometimes fall from the sky, but at this timing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それも直撃するとは・・まさに奇跡だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And it hit directly... truly a miracle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ・・この石がそうですよ。魔物将軍のそばに落ちていました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... this stone is it. It fell near the demon general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さわってみたら・・あちっ（隕石ほしいなぁ・・とマリアが手を出す）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I touched it... ouch! (Maria reaches out saying, 'I want that meteorite...')

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すると隕石がパカっと割れた。中から煙と共に羊皮紙が出てきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the meteorite cracked open. A scroll appeared from inside along with smoke.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

I'll kill him."},{"lineNumber":251879,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍「なんじゃ・・・どうして、こんな小数の連中に・・」","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon General: \"What... why by such a small number of guys...?\""},{"lineNumber":251880,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍は倒した、腹の中の女の子をひっぱりだしたいが","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon general was defeated, I want to pull out the girl inside his stomach,"},{"lineNumber":251881,"originalJapaneseLine":"周囲の魔物兵が向かってきている、くそっとランスは諦めて逃げる。","translatedEnglishLine":"but demon soldiers around are advancing. Damn, Lance gives up and flees."},{"lineNumber":251882,"originalJapaneseLine":"１体は倒した、もう一体どこかにいるはずだが・・","translatedEnglishLine":"One was defeated, but another must be somewhere..."},{"lineNumber":251883,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここはいったん退くぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's withdraw for now."},{"lineNumber":251884,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍と何度か戦闘しながら、ランス達はなんとか少し離れた場所の砦まで戻った。","translatedEnglishLine":"After fighting the demon army several times, Lance and the others somehow returned to a fortress a little distance away."},{"lineNumber":251885,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス軍が使用していた砦だ。数名のゼス兵士が居て扉を開けてくれた。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a fortress used by the Zeth army. A few Zeth soldiers were there and opened the door for us."},{"lineNumber":251886,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだいるのか、なら戦えよとランスは言うが","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance said, \"Oh, you're here, then fight,\" but"},{"lineNumber":251887,"originalJapaneseLine":"兵士達はびびっている、すみません・・ここには８人しかいないのです","translatedEnglishLine":"The soldiers were scared and said, \"Sorry... there are only eight of us here.\""},{"lineNumber":251888,"originalJapaneseLine":"あんな魔軍の大軍に向かうなんて犬死でしか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Facing such a large demon army would only be a meaningless death..."},{"lineNumber":251889,"originalJapaneseLine":"８人だと・・砦の中をみわたすとけっこういた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Only eight... but looking around inside the fortress, there were quite a few."},{"lineNumber":251890,"originalJapaneseLine":"嘘つけ、いっぱいいるじゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Lies, there's a lot here."},{"lineNumber":251891,"originalJapaneseLine":"誰かが見て言う、いえ違います・・これは・・石化されています。","translatedEnglishLine":"Someone looked and said, \"No, that's not right... they are petrified.\""},{"lineNumber":251892,"originalJapaneseLine":"石化されているゼス兵士が３０名ほど砦の中にいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"About 30 Zeth soldiers were petrified inside the fortress."},{"lineNumber":251893,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　その頃、メディウサとアレフガルド","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, Medusa and Alefgard."},{"lineNumber":251894,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　石化能力の事","translatedEnglishLine":"About the petrification ability."},{"lineNumber":251895,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　　カオスを警戒してメディウサに外出しないでとお願いしている","translatedEnglishLine":"They are asking Medusa not to go outside, wary of Chaos."},{"lineNumber":251896,"originalJapaneseLine":"砦、ランス達・・","translatedEnglishLine":"The fortress, Lance and the others..."},{"lineNumber":251897,"originalJapaneseLine":"メディウサが襲ってきたのか・・ふむふむ","translatedEnglishLine":"Did Medusa attack? Hmm, hmm."},{"lineNumber":251898,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス兵が、仲間がこんな状態だから我々は戦えない","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth soldiers say they can't fight because their comrades are in such a state."},{"lineNumber":251899,"originalJapaneseLine":"この石化、私直せますよとクルックーが解除していく","translatedEnglishLine":"Klukku says, \"I can cure this petrification,\" and starts to reverse it."},{"lineNumber":251900,"originalJapaneseLine":"私も出来ますとシィルも","translatedEnglishLine":"Shiel also says, \"I can do it too.\""},{"lineNumber":251901,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人して、石化を解除した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Together, the two removed the petrification."},{"lineNumber":251902,"originalJapaneseLine":"さて、おまえら、これで戦えるな、いけー","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, you guys can fight with this, go!"},{"lineNumber":251903,"originalJapaneseLine":"うわっ、すみません・・無理です、４０人弱では一緒です","translatedEnglishLine":"Whoa, sorry... it's impossible. With fewer than 40, it's the same."},{"lineNumber":251904,"originalJapaneseLine":"ま、雑魚兵どもだからしかないな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, since they're low-level soldiers, it can't be helped."},{"lineNumber":251905,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は砦の屋上にいった","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others went to the fortress rooftop."},{"lineNumber":251906,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し離れた所に魔軍が進撃している。","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army is advancing a little distance away."},{"lineNumber":251907,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍を一体倒したので数は減っている、２万弱という所か・・","translatedEnglishLine":"They defeated one demon general, so their number has decreased, around just under 20,000..."},{"lineNumber":251908,"originalJapaneseLine":"今、それを防ぐ部隊もいない。ゼス首都がピンチ","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, there is no unit defending against this. Zeth's capital is in danger."},{"lineNumber":251909,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちっ、だいぶまとまった集団になっているな。","translatedEnglishLine":"Tch, they've become quite an organized group."},{"lineNumber":251910,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス様の強襲で魔物将軍が一人やられたので用心しているようですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"Because Lord Lance's raid took out one demon general, they seem to be (Maria reaches out saying, 'I want that meteorite...')"},{"lineNumber":251931,"originalJapaneseLine":"すると隕石がパカっと割れた。中から煙と共に羊皮紙が出てきた","translatedEnglishLine":"Then the meteorite cracked open. A scroll appeared from inside along with smoke."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、あそこだ。魔物将軍の奴、俺達が攻めてきたのを見て
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, over there. That demon general, seeing us attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あわてて周囲の部隊に集結を命じているのだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: must be hastily ordering the surrounding troops to gather.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、奴はあの中心に居る、いくぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So he's at the center there, let's go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスアタックで魔物を蹴散らす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll scatter the demons with Lance Attack.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どけーじゃまだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Move aside, you're in the way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして魔物の壁を突破した先に、のそのそと歩いている丸くてでかい奴がいた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And beyond breaking through the wall of demons, there was a big, round guy lumbering along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いたぞ、魔物将軍だ。ぶっ殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There he is, the demon general. I'll kill him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍「なんじゃ・・・どうして、こんな小数の連中に・・」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon General: "What... why by such a small number of guys...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍は倒した、腹の中の女の子をひっぱりだしたいが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon general was defeated, I want to pull out the girl inside his stomach,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲の魔物兵が向かってきている、くそっとランスは諦めて逃げる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but demon soldiers around are advancing. Damn, Lance gives up and flees.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １体は倒した、もう一体どこかにいるはずだが・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One was defeated, but another must be somewhere...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここはいったん退くぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's withdraw for now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍と何度か戦闘しながら、ランス達はなんとか少し離れた場所の砦まで戻った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After fighting the demon army several times, Lance and the others somehow returned to a fortress a little distance away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス軍が使用していた砦だ。数名のゼス兵士が居て扉を開けてくれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a fortress used by the Zeth army. A few Zeth soldiers were there and opened the door for us.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだいるのか、なら戦えよとランスは言うが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance said, "Oh, you're here, then fight," but

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵士達はびびっている、すみません・・ここには８人しかいないのです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldiers were scared and said, "Sorry... there are only eight of us here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんな魔軍の大軍に向かうなんて犬死でしか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Facing such a large demon army would only be a meaningless death...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ８人だと・・砦の中をみわたすとけっこういた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only eight... but looking around inside the fortress, there were quite a few.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嘘つけ、いっぱいいるじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lies, there's a lot here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰かが見て言う、いえ違います・・これは・・石化されています。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone looked and said, "No, that's not right... they are petrified."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 石化されているゼス兵士が３０名ほど砦の中にいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 30 Zeth soldiers were petrified inside the fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、メディウサとアレフガルド
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Medusa and Alefgard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 石化能力の事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About the petrification ability.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオスを警戒してメディウサに外出しないでとお願いしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are asking Medusa not to go outside, wary of Chaos.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砦、ランス達・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The fortress, Lance and the others...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メディウサが襲ってきたのか・・ふむふむ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did Medusa attack? Hmm, hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス兵が、仲間がこんな状態だから我々は戦えない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth soldiers say they can't fight because their comrades are in such a state.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この石化、私直せますよとクルックーが解除していく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Klukku says, "I can cure this petrification," and starts to reverse it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私も出来ますとシィルも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shiel also says, "I can do it too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人して、石化を解除した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Together, the two removed the petrification.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さて、おまえら、これで戦えるな、いけー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, you guys can fight with this, go!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うわっ、すみません・・無理です、４０人弱では一緒です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whoa, sorry... it's impossible. With fewer than 40, it's the same.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、雑魚兵どもだからしかないな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, since they're low-level soldiers, it can't be helped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は砦の屋上にいった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others went to the fortress rooftop.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し離れた所に魔軍が進撃している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army is advancing a little distance away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍を一体倒したので数は減っている、２万弱という所か・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They defeated one demon general, so their number has decreased, around just under 20,000...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、それを防ぐ部隊もいない。ゼス首都がピンチ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, there is no unit defending against this. Zeth's capital is in danger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、だいぶまとまった集団になっているな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, they've become quite an organized group.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様の強襲で魔物将軍が一人やられたので用心しているようですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because Lord Lance's raid took out one demon general, they seem to be cautious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達が戦わないと防げない状況だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a situation where only Lance and the others could stop it by fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キランと天が光る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sky flashed brightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして何かが・・魔軍陣地の中に落ちていった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And something... fell into the demon army's camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくして魔軍が動揺しはじめ・・そして逃げ出していった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a while, the demon army started to panic... then began fleeing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、何が起こった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is this, what happened?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、いってみよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, let's go see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは逃げる魔物兵を追った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance chased the fleeing demon soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこには魔物将軍の死体が転がっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There lay the dead body of the demon general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何十にも魔物兵に守られランスが近寄る事が出来なかった奴だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He was guarded by dozens of demon soldiers and Lance couldn't get close.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰がどうやって殺したんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who and how was he killed?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 側で腰を抜かしていた魔物兵がいたのでそいつから聞き出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was a demon soldier who had collapsed nearby, so Lance questioned him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は見たんだ、天がきらっと光ったら、頭くらいの石が落ちてきて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I saw it, the sky flashed brightly, then a stone about the size of a head fell,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まっすぐに魔物将軍様に直撃したんだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it hit the demon general directly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな奇跡あっていいのか、なんて事だ。俺達はもう少しで一番乗りで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is such a miracle allowed? What the hell. We were about to be the first to

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間どもの首都に攻め込んで傍若無人出来たのにー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: invade the humans' capital and act without restraint—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 隕石か・・確かに、たまに空から落ちてくるというが、それがこのタイミングで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A meteorite, huh... It's true they sometimes fall from the sky, but at this timing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それも直撃するとは・・まさに奇跡だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And it hit directly... truly a miracle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ・・この石がそうですよ。魔物将軍のそばに落ちていました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... this stone is it. It fell near the demon general.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さわってみたら・・あちっ（隕石ほしいなぁ・・とマリアが手を出す）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I touched it... ouch! (Maria reaches out saying, 'I want that meteorite...')

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すると隕石がパカっと割れた。中から煙と共に羊皮紙が出てきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the meteorite cracked open. A scroll appeared from inside along with smoke.
